required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate the Pharmacokinetics of Dexlansoprazole 30 Milligram (mg) and 60 mg Delayed-release Capsules in Healthy Chinese Participants
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1, Single-Center, Open-Label, 2-Arm Parallel Group, Single-Dose Study to Evaluate the Pharmacokinetics of Dexlansoprazole 30 mg and 60 mg Delayed-Release Capsules in Healthy Chinese Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to assess the pharmacokinetics after a single dose of dexlansoprazole 30 and 60 mg delayed-release capsules in healthy Chinese participants.

detailed_description.textblock:
The drug being tested in this study is called dexlansoprazole. This study will assess the pharmacokinetics, safety and tolerability of a single oral dose of dexlansoprazole 30 mg and 60 mg delayed-release capsules in healthy participants.
The study will enroll approximately 40 participants, 20 participants in each parallel arm. Participants will be randomly assigned (by chance, like flipping a coin) to one of the two treatment groups:
- Group 1: A single oral dose of dexlansoprazole 30 mg delayed-release capsule
- Group 2: A single oral dose of dexlansoprazole 60 mg delayed-release capsule
All participants will be asked to take single dose of study drug on Day 1.
This single center trial will be conducted in China. The overall time to participate in this study is approximately 40 days. Participants will be contacted by telephone or will make a final visit to the clinic 5 to 10 days after receiving their last dose of study drug for a follow-up assessment.

primary_outcome.measure: Cmax: Maximum Observed Plasma Concentration for Dexlansoprazole
primary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 pre-dose and at multiple time points (up to 24 hours) post-dose

primary_outcome.measure: AUClast: Area Under the Plasma Concentration-time Curve From Time 0 to the Time of the Last Quantifiable Concentration for Dexlansoprazole
primary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 pre-dose and at multiple time points (up to 24 hours) post-dose

primary_outcome.measure: AUCâˆž: Area Under the Plasma Concentration-time Curve From Time 0 to Infinity for Dexlansoprazole
primary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 pre-dose and at multiple time points (up to 24 hours) post-dose

arm_group.description: Dexlansoprazole 30 mg, delayed-release, capsule, orally, administered as single dose on Day 1.
Dexlansoprazole 60 mg, delayed-release, capsule, orally, administered as single dose on Day 1.

criteria.textblock:
Main Inclusion Criteria:
1. Is a healthy adult man or woman of Chinese descent.
2. Weighs at least 50 kilogram (kg) and has a body mass index (BMI) from 19.0 to 26.0 kilogram per square meter (kg/m^2), inclusive at Screening Visit.
Main Exclusion Criteria:
1. Has a history of drug abuse (defined as any illicit drug use) or a history of alcohol abuse within 1 year prior to the Screening visit or is unwilling to agree to abstain from alcohol for 48 hours prior to Check-in (Day -1) throughout the confinement and for 48 hours prior to each clinic visit and drugs throughout the study.
2. Has poor peripheral venous access.
3. Has donated blood products (such as plasma), whole blood or had a significant blood loss (450 milliliter [mL]) within 56 days of Day 1.
